name: Dungeon Delusional
description:
• F - To Pick Up Items
  • LMB to Attack
  • RMB to throw your Sword (granted you have the upgrade)
  • The heart... might make you lose a life and it might make you gain one.
     (no guarantees)

<-----About------>

A game about fighting your way through a dungeon. But what you will find out at the end is that it might not exactly be true.

Theme:

what ties the game to the theme is the end of the game.
